featured.text: Stretch limousines were hired to drive the prom-goers to expensive restaurants or discos for an all-night extravaganza.
They are occasions for teens to show off their limousines.

definition.zh_def: 一種豪華的長型轎車，通常用於特殊場合或接送服務。
definition.en_def: A luxury long car, often used for special occasions or transportation services.
definition.example: They arrived at the wedding in a beautiful limousine.
